1610 Washtenaw Avenue
Ann Arborf Michigan
Dear Harry:
I am delighted to know that your Board approved
of carrying over funds for possible use in radio
programming during the coining year* The NAEB
Program Planning Subcommittee chaired by Kenneth Wright
is working on recommendations at the present time*
Sincerely yours.
Frank E* Schooley
President
